title: Bug splat
body: So... i have a little issue when i start game its totally fine then i choose map/gametype and start play ban - choose - wait for others to do so... and now black screen and it says CHECK FOR INTERNET CONNECTION so i did so everything is in order so i press reconnect and bug splat... i tried like 20 times and still bug splat now i'il get tons of reports for this please i need help

replies.body: This black screen and bugsplat error might be due to a driver or game file that's failing to render.  I don't want you to get reports, so stick to custom games for now to troubleshoot!  The steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide should help fix this up.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with some steps!

problem is that i am lockdown on last game , each time i relog on launcher he immediatly try to reconect on my last game playing in this case this game that i am tryng to reconect for 1+ hour from now on , its doesnt allow me anything else

Your issue sounds a bit different, more like a network issue that's struggling to reach our services.  For your specific issue, the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help.

However, the hrt can aid you by auto-configuring your firewall settings as an additional step.  I hope that helps!
